iPad Pro delivers epic power, now in 12.9-inch and 9.7-inch sizes. Discover the A9X Chip, Advanced Retina display, 12MP iSight camera and more.

item.title: BioAmber is a Sustainable Chemicals Company Offering Choice, Naturally
item.description:
BioAmber is a Sustainable Chemicals Company Offering Choice, Naturally

BioAmber is a sustainable chemicals company. Its proprietary technology platform combines industrial biotechnology and chemical catalysis to convert renewable feedstock into chemicals for use in a wide variety of everyday products including plastics, resins, food additives and personal care products.

item.title: Earth Alive I Soil activator
item.description:
Earth Alive I Soil activator

A NATURAL AND POWERFUL BIOFERTILIZER FOR HEALTHIER SOIL AND STRONGER PLANTS FROM THE ROOTS UP. APPROVED INPUT FOR ORGANIC AGRICULTURE REGISTRATION NO. 2014052A, CANADA FERTILIZERS ACT http://www.inspection.gc.ca Earth Alive Soil Activator TM is a patent-pending biofertilizer and biostimulant designed for organic and conventional agriculture.

item.title: SOIL ACTIVATOR IMPROVES CROP YIELDS IN ORGANIC BANANA PRODUCTION
item.description:
SOIL ACTIVATOR IMPROVES CROP YIELDS IN ORGANIC BANANA PRODUCTION

Montreal, Quebec, Canada, January 18th, 2015 - Earth Alive Clean Technologies Inc. (CSE: EAC) ("Earth Alive" or the "Company") is pleased to report significant increases in banana crop yields by a factor of 100% to 200%, over the regional average, for producers using Soil ActivatorTM.

item.title: Tesla shares have been crushed this year
item.description:
Tesla shares have been crushed this year

Tesla shares are getting clobbered: they're down almost 20% this year after dropping another 3% Tuesday to $191. That's a far cry from their 2014 peak of nearly $300. The latest dip is being chalked up to a research note from JP Morgan's Ryan Brinkman, in which his team reduced its expectations for Tesla's fourth-quarter earnings.
